channel.title: Send quest ids and npc hits?>
channel.description: Does anyone have a dump of all the SendQuest ids and or knows how to change the NPC hits on Devolution (dodian)

item.title: Send quest ids and npc hits?>
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

[quote=“itzkyle, post:6, topic:170069”]Thank you , do you know about making players attack slower?

Attached is a list of many sendQuest IDs

Thank You To

WTF??? some noob gave e one rep in this topic saying hello XD[/quote]

dont use actionTimer… add a weaponTimer or something. It takes forever but you have to add a weapon delay for each weapon in the game… then go into into your attacking method (boolean attack() or whatever if yours is custom) and make it only work if the timer is zero, then reset the timer.

Im not sure if that is what you were asking but thats how you change attack speeds.

Read full topic

item.title: Send quest ids and npc hits?>
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Hmm… I believe you could also place this under that’s NPC animation, not sure.

Try like:

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == npcid) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = animid; hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(maxhit);

Example:

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745 && misc.random(2) == 1) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2655; //poke npcs[NPCID].actionTimer = 7; hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(97);

That’s what I have for jad, and it’s completely working for me.

Read full topic

item.source: Send quest ids and npc hits?>

item.title: Send quest ids and npc hits?>
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

For Npc hits, go in Npchandler.java, and search for

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 49) {

Under the last }, press enter once and add:

} if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == npc) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(maxhit);

Example:

} if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2881) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(35);

Which means Dagannoth Prime (2881) has a max hit of 35.

Read full topic
